snippet: Remoteness and environmental concerns piled costs on the Gorgon liquefied natural gas project, just as energy prices slumped.
abstract: Chevron's Gorgon liquefied gas-processing plant on Australia's Barrow Island deals with strict environmental regulations to protect island's unique wildlife; logistics have boosted original plant cost of $37 billion to $54 billion; Chevron says it underestimated complexity of getting equipment to site.
lead_paragraph: Remoteness and environmental concerns piled costs on the Gorgon liquefied natural gas project, just as energy prices slumped.

headline.main: Logistics and Lizards Disrupt Chevron’s Project Off Australia
headline.print_headline: Tricky Logistics and Rare Lizards Trip Up Chevron
